Dear David

This is not really an answer to your query but Edmunds, in 
his 'Pointers and Clues to the Subjects of Chinese and Japanese Art', 
describes The Maple with deer as being the emblem of autumn.

Regards, John L.







--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "David Zincavage" <jdz@i...> 
wrote:
>       Can anybody explain how maple leaves & deer antler would 
symbolize the battles of the above fellows? Ref: Haynes catalogue 5: 
item 63, p. 27.  
>
